test.name: testcase1 部门管理

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: 展开所有菜单
kw.doc: 点击展开所有按钮功能

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering mouse over the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element 'xpath=//*[@class="l-btn-text icon-expand"]'.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: 进入部门管理
kw.doc: 点击部门管理菜单，并且验证打开后的页面元素

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: element is visible and click
kw.doc: 自建Keyword，功能：页面元素显示，并且点击

arguments.arg: 部门管理菜单没能及时刷新

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

arguments.arg: 部门管理页面的frame还没进入吧

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: 验证部门管理页面元素
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

arguments.arg: 部门管理页面的新增部门按钮没有定位到

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is enabled.

arguments.arg: 部门管理页面的新增部门按钮无法点击

kw.name: Xpath Should Match X Times
kw.doc: Deprecated, use `Page Should Contain Element` with ``limit`` argument instead.
kw.msg: Current page contains 1 elements matching 'xpath://*[text()="新增部门"]'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: 验证部门管理页面是有内容的
